title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 300.2 - Effect
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 300.2 - Effect

State Regulations

This Part shall apply only to any signs installed on and
after November 22, 2014, whether installed in a location where no sign was
previously posted or installed to replace a sign. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
300.2

Adopted, New

York State Register November 19, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 46, eff. 11/19/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
